segments.text: Excuse me , but I'm not feeling too well . I think I'm going to throw up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's an airsickness bag behind the seat that's in front of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this your first time flying ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I'm going to San Francisco .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's a beautiful city . I think you'll like it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , I'm feeling much better already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes if you don't think about it , that sick feeling will go away on its own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . By the way , my name is Mary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm Frank . Nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2
